meanings.definition: A breed of domestic cat known for its spotted coat and wild appearance.
meanings.sent1: The ocicats at the shelter were all playful and energetic.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of ocicats at the cat show.
meanings.sent3: The ocicats decided to have a dance party in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like an ocicat, full of surprises and energy.
meanings.sent5: The ocicats' unique coat patterns made them stand out from other cats.
